unnormalised: As per Govt. regulations, please ensure your Aadhar No. and PAN are linked to your employee ID, EMP12345. Additionally, kindly submit copies of your Class 10th and Class 12th marksheets, along with degree certificate mentioning your roll no. if you haven't already. Verification is mandatory by 31/07/2024 to avoid discrepancies with UIDAI database.
normalised: As per government regulations, please ensure your A-A-D-H-A-R number and P-A-N are linked to your employee I-D, E-M-P one two three four five. Additionally, kindly submit copies of your Class tenth and Class twelfth marksheets, along with degree certificate mentioning your roll number if you haven't already. Verification is mandatory by thirty first July two thousand and twenty four to avoid discrepancies with U-I-D-A-I database.
